item.title: Large Scale Ftth Feasability
item.description: When investing in a large scale FTTH project, it is important to conduct a feasibility study to determine the potential return on investment. This involves analyzing the costs and benefits of the project, as well as assessing the market demand and competition. Hexvarium developed a unique approach which combine financial modelling, outside plant network design, capital budgeting over time and market analysis to determine the feasibility of a large scale FTTH project.
